Searches
 * [http://code.google.com/p/googlebugs/issues/list?can=2&q=status:New&colspec=ID%20Type%20Status%20Priority%20Milestone%20Owner%20Summary New bugs] should be processed by a moderator.
 * [http://code.google.com/p/googlebugs/issues/list?can=2&q=-label%3AProduct&colspec=ID+Type+Status+Priority+Milestone+Owner+Summary No product label] should get a product label.
 * [http://code.google.com/p/googlebugs/issues/list?can=2&q=type:Defect&colspec=ID%20Type%20Status%20Priority%20Milestone%20Owner%20Summary Type defect] should be classified as bug or enhancement.


Tips:
 * You can add the column 'Product' to the default view.
